I think Paul Varley's "Warriors of Japan" and Wayne Ferris "Heavenly 
Warri=
ors" are two other crucial works. "Japan Before Tokugawa" (edited 
by Hall)=
 has a lot of great stuff as well. Of course, it all depends on 
what aspec=
t of the samurai history one is interested in.
Cepo, Honolulu
